attributes.action: End daylight savings, use BST time zone permanently.
attributes.additional_details:
1: Improves mental health
2: Reduce risks for children coming home from school, and workers coming home from work.
attributes.background: Daylight savings in October often results in increased risk on roads, and negative mental health effects. Ending daylight savings should eliminate this.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702292
